message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product and I think you'd really love it.  I'm asking for $150 for it, but I'm open to negotiation.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $135. This is still a great deal for a product of this quality.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $125.
